promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive special fox dark-type pokemon with a ornate tail. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptail, a a massive special fox dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Spike Shot. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "dark" or "Cryptail". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, fox-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Cryptail, the Shadow Canid species: dwells in vault-like arenas. It fires piercing spikes from its tail and thrives under the cloak of nightfall.
